data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.END_DATE = @endDate)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, DATE_OF_DEATH from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadFips
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, STATE_ABBREVIATION from CKT_FIPS where [STATE] = @state

data.name: ReadInvalidSsn
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, SSN from CKT_INVALID_SSN where (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (SSN = @ssn)
